TopicTitle: Rowsdower Contest Prize suggestion: Create on module based on the prize winner wishes

Articles.Content:
Rowsdower in the KSP blog (http://kerbaldevteam.tumblr.com/post/74888946036/devnote-tuesdays-the-almost-forgot-to-title-this), asked the readers what would be a good prize for a contest that may or may not have several winners.

How about a module (that would have to be useful/meaningful ) designed on the winners wishes, and have his (In game AND/OR real life) name, mentioned in the part description. For example I'd like to have a space telescope module (a la Hubble) or a Fuel Extractor (like a simple version of Kethane, would have to be heavy, cumbersome and extremely electricity hungry) but that would give a purpose to bases on other worlds.

These are just examples, feel free to add your own suggestion for a prize you would like to win

Edited January 29, 2014 by Arendey
yeah that or a monolith with all the winners names somewhere?
